exploreUrl:
<js>
var result = []
var push = (title, url, size) => result.push({
  title: title,
  url: url,
  style: {
    layout_flexGrow: 1,
    layout_flexBasisPercent: size
  }
})
var tg = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://mangguoshufang.com/0/list/1.html')).select('.x-category__box:nth-of-type(1) a');

tg.forEach(tag => {
	  var nam = tag.text()
	  ul = String(tag.attr('href')).replace("1.html","{{page}}.html");
    push(nam,ul,0.25);
});

JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (src.includes('Just a moment...')) { 
	     cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl);
        cf = java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl,'éªŒè¯',false).body();
} else {
	cf = src;
	}
	cf;
</js>
.x-book
ruleSearch.name: p[class~=name]@text

searchUrl:
<js>
var url = source.getKey();
java.webView(null ,url,null );
var co = cookie.getCookie(url);
var urls = url+'/search.html,';
var dj = {
  "body": "searchkey={{key}}",
  "method": "POST",
  "Cookie":co
}
var post = JSON.stringify(dj);
var so = urls+ post;
so;
</js>

<js>
sckey = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(source.key + "search")).select(".page-search").attr("data-id");
java.log(sckey);
body = {
  "body": `name=${key}&tags=&type=3&tt=&page_index=${page}&app=2&searchkey=${sckey}`,
  "headers":{"Referer":source.key},
  "method": "POST"
}
result = source.key + "api/search/list" + "," + JSON.stringify(body);
result;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var id = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
var ul = `${source.key}/userverify/book/${id}/list.html`
var result = java.get(ul,{}).header("location");
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html",ml);
    java.longToast("æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºwebViewåŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½ã€‚");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // éå†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é˜…è¯»å†…ç½®Base64è§£ç æ–¹æ³•
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>
